Service Details: - Provides reasonably priced, hot, nutritious meals including soup, entree and dessert or frozen meals which can stored in your freezer - Options include meals suitable for diabetics, minced, pureed or vegetarian- Delivered over the lunch hour by volunteers- Hot meals provided by Deli City and delivered by Meals on Wheels
